subject: Order #SSN3576
description_text:
What happen with the order?

It appears as returned.

Help please

conversations.body_text: Hi Andros ﾃ」ila,    The shipment was returned due to excess weight. We will inform you immediately once we have a new tracking number. Normally, we will reship the order for you, so please rest assured.

Hi Andros ﾃ」ila,    Our German warehouse is indeed out of stock. We have arranged for your order to be dispatched via alternative channels, but rest assured there will be no customs duties or additional charges. Should any arise, we shall reimburse them in full. We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEKO2846334972YQ

More than 6 weeks and nothing. New tracking appears to be stopped. I want
full refund.

El El jue, 4 dic 2025 a las 11:33, support@simsonn.com

Hi Andros ﾃ」ila,    We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused. Unfortunately, the shipment has been returned again. We can only ship your order via UPS Express, with an estimated delivery date of the 23rd. However, customs duties will apply. Alternatively, we can cancel your order since our German warehouse has indeed experienced delays.

Ok, cancel the order and refund, please. Thank you.

El El jue, 18 dic 2025 a las 11:57, support@simsonn.com
Hi Andros ﾃ」ila,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. We have processed your refund.
